Capabilities.Title: Forward Online Capabilities
Capabilities.Line2: Access to banking products and services anywhere and at any time.
Capabilities.Line4: Functionality meets modern requirements of customers.
Capabilities.Line6: The system design is built on the basis of the intuitive preferences of the user. According to the standards of Material design of Android and IOS Human Interface Guidelines.

Functionality.Title: Functionality
Functionality.Subtitle: Basic functionality
Functionality.Line1: Self-registration in the system, the ability of the account management client.
Functionality.Line2: Viewing Deposit products (including the files) with possibility of replenishment and open (WEB, mobile app).
Functionality.Line3: The formation of statements of accounts of the user, display account statements (WEB, mobile, apps), the mechanism of the latest operations of the user-specific account, export / print statements.
Functionality.Line4: Create and send Bank transfers between your accounts, by account number to the Bank's Clients, by phone number to Forward online users, saving templates of payment documents.
Functionality.Line5: A mechanism for receiving and loading data of branches and ATMs (input xml file), determining the current location of the receive location data about your current location.
Functionality.Line6: Automatic download of current exchange rates from the ABS, information on the current rates in the System (web) with possibility of transition to a separate screen to display the change history of course.
Functionality.Line7: Services for locking and unlocking a user for CRM system
Functionality.Line8: Setting currency exchange rates MPs through the administrative part and their reflection in the System (WEB, mobile app).

Security.Title: System Security
Security.Line1: Authentication: username and password, fingerprint, OTP by SMS, digital signature
Security.Line2: The dependence of the available functionality of the system from the authentication method
Security.Line3: Control and check the status of user certificates
Security.Line4: Distribution of administrators / engineers / users of the Bank according to the provided roles
Security.Line5: Support various systems of cryptography and tokens (RSA, GOST)
